title: House of the Dragon S1E4 Synopsis
description:
The synopsis is a quick way to get yourself primed for the post-episode discussions to come! When first posted, our synopsis episodes are audio-only, but by later in the day they are available in video format as well.

All season long, tune in Mondays at 6 pm eastern for Review episodes and Saturdays at 3 pm eastern for Preview (spoiler-filled) episodes, with special guests.

Bonus Eps & More - www.patreon.com/historyofwesteros
Shirts & Stickers - historyofwesteros.threadless.com
Outro - Brandon Winslow (Bran the Builder @brwthepro)
www.historyofwesteros.com
dc:creator: History of Westeros
